name: Don't Wake Up (Ellpeck)
description:
Don't Wake Up is a short puzzle game about what it feels like* to have a panic attack.

This game features several simple puzzle elements that are put together into 9 levels of varying difficulty. You play as a girl who is trapped in her own thoughts, trying to navigate them and get her head straight.

Controls:
Arrow keys to move
Space or Enter to select
R to restart the current level

I hope you enjoy playing this game.

*This game is about what it feels like for me to have a panic attack. Everyone's experience with depression and anxiety is different, but I enjoyed distilling my feelings into this game. If you're ever feeling depressed, please reach out to someone. <3

Also, you can view the source here.
